snippet: The artist Tatzu Nishi, through the Public Art Fund and a lot of cooperation from New York City officials, plans to erect a living room around the statue of Christopher Columbus 60 feet above Columbus Circle.
abstract: Artist Tatzu Nishi, through the Public Art Fund and a lot of cooperation from New York City officials, plans to erect a living room around the statue of Christopher Columbus 60 feet above Columbus Circle; 'living room' will be used for workers to do much-needed restoration work when the exhibit ends.
lead_paragraph: The artist Tatzu Nishi, through the Public Art Fund and a lot of cooperation from New York City officials, plans to erect a living room around the statue of Christopher Columbus 60 feet above Columbus Circle.

headline.seo: In Columbus Circle, Tatzu Nishi to Build Living Room
headline.main: High Above Columbus Circle, a Living Room, TV Included
headline.print_headline: High Above Columbus Circle, A Living Room, TV Included
